comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: She appears to have been a participant in the Beaux Arts Society's Venetian Pageant at the Hotel Astor. New York Times story, February 21, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D03E0DF163AE6...
